data.meta_description: Bodo M√∂ller Chemie | 12,340 followers on LinkedIn. Engineer chemistry | Bodo M√∂ller Chemie is one of the leading distributors of speciality chemical products and bonding solutions in Europe. With over 45 years of experience in this field our Core business areas are Adhesives & Sealants, Additives, Polymers and Coatings. With its headquarters in Germany (Offenbach) and subsidiaries in now 24 offices in Europe, Africa and Asia, a production plant in Egypt and a laboratory in Poland, the Bodo M√∂ller Chemie Group has developed into a global operating company.

Henkel's innovative LOCTITE¬Æ electrically conductive adhesives (ECA) are at the forefront of ensuring robust bonds between components and printed circuit boards, guaranteeing reliable, long-term performance that meets the demands of modern industries. With a diverse product portfolio encompassing ECA based on various raw material platforms - including acrylates, epoxies, and silicones - manufacturers are empowered with a broad choice and flexibility to address diverse application requirements. Additionally, the possibility of hybrid systems further enhances adaptability. Curious to learn more about how Henkel's electrically conductive adhesives can propel your projects to new heights? New event with interactive concept: Bodo M√∂ller Chemie offers a new seminar for the metal industry Bodo M√∂ller Chemie is adding another event to its successful TechDialog seminar series: a specialist seminar on innovative surface technologies for the metal industry will be held in Heidelberg for the first time on 21st November 2024. With an interactive concept consisting of lectures and small group workshops, the TechDialog offers a varied platform for intensive exchange and practical training. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/eR6bUBeQ You want to register? Then click here: https://lnkd.in/exMATPgb #BodoM√∂llerChemie #Engineerchemistry #News #TechDialog #Seminar #SurfaceTechnologies

We are proud to be a sponsor of the impressive 15-year-old swimmer Rosa Reitz (SSKC Poseidon Aschaffenburg), who crossed Lake Constance / Bodensee twice on 03.08.2024 as part of the international Bodensee Open Water Events! Rosa completed the distance from Friedrichshafen to Romanshorn and back, a total of around 22 km, in an incredible 6:52 hours, making her the fastest of seven swimmers (5 men and 2 women). This achievement was made even more difficult by strong winds and challenging navigation conditions. Despite these challenges, Rosa shone and crossed the finish line in first place. An incredible achievement that only a few have reached, as most of the nearly 80 participants swam only half-way. The water quality was excellent with a pleasant temperature of 24¬∞C, which provided optimal conditions for this great performance. Congratulations, Rosa! Bodo M√∂ller Chemie congratulates you on this great success and wishes you all the best for your future swimming career. #BodoM√∂llerChemie #OpenWaterSwimming #Bodensee #Success #Sponsoring #Swimming #Congratulation

As of August 1st, we are happy to announce that Bodo M√∂ller Chemie has been officially appointed as the Distributor for Huntsman Tooling Products across a broad range of countries. Our distribution territories now include: Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Denmark, Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Romania, Bulgaria, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, North Macedonia, Montenegro, Serbia, Slovenia, Hungary, Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Jordan, Egypt, South Africa, India, Israel This expansion allows us to provide even more customers with high-quality Huntsman Tooling Products, backed by our exceptional service and technical expertise. We are excited to bring innovative solutions and reliable support to these new markets. Furthermore, we are the only supplier in Europe for UREOL¬Æ Tooling boards. We look forward to serving our customers in these regions and helping them achieve their goals with the best products in the industry. Find the expert for your region: https://lnkd.in/eFEBu8WA #BodoM√∂llerChemie #Huntsman #Ureol #ToolingProducts #Distribution #GlobalExpansion

Wax additives play a crucial role in achieving specific surface effects and enhancing the overall appearance, scratch & abrasion resistance, durability, haptics, and surface smoothness. Our Lanco and Aquaslip series are used in a variety of applications such as plastic compounding, leather & wood care products and polishes, adhesives, lubricants, building materials, automotive, and much more. Lubrizol surface modifiers are available in a wide range, including carnauba, amide, and polyolefin waxes and are offered as emulsion, dispersion, and micronized solutions for various purposes. Selecting the right wax additive is pivotal to meeting the performance requirements of your industry. Don¬¥t hesitate to ask our experts for the perfect wax additive for your specific needs. Find the expert for your region: https://lnkd.in/eFEBu8WA #BodoM√∂llerChemie #EngineerChemistry #Lubrizol #Waxadditives

We are excited to welcome Yoon Yoonsuk Yang as Managing Director of Bodo M√∂ller Chemie Korea. Yoon's expertise based on the experience in various chemical and plastic industries will lead Bodo M√∂ller Chemie's global presence and expansion by providing differentiated solutions in many industries in Korea. Previously, Yoon has worked at Henkel, focusing on the appliance and thermal management sectors, at Avient in the packaging and textile markets, as well as at LG Chem in the Polyolefin division. Welcome to Bodo M√∂ller Chemie, Yoon Yang! We look forward to seeing the growth in Korea. #BodoM√∂llerChemie #Engineerchemistry #Korea #Expansion
